text: Friday the 13th Part 2 is a 1981 American slasher movie produced and directed by Steve Miner, and the second installment in the Friday the 13th movie series. It is a direct sequel to Friday the 13th. The movie marks the first appearance of Jason Voorhees as the killer; his mother was the killer in the last movie. Steve Daskewisz plays Jason. It was released on April 30, 1981. ==References== Category:1981 horror movies Category:1980s sequel movies Category:American sequel movies Category:Friday the 13th movies
title: Friday the 13th Part 2
